::: {#hero-heading}
olivia is an interdisciplinary scientist, writer and artist from ngunnawal and ngambri country (canberra, "australia").

their scientific work focuses on applied ecology; where they specialised in ornithology for a research thesis at the australian national university.

artistically, they enjoy exploring and archiving sound, photo and text.
:::
